caption:
“Pilgrims never arrive—they awaken.”

Reflection:
The destination is not a place but a revelation. The road leads to awareness, not arrival.

Commentary:
This line reframes the spiritual journey as awakening. Faith matures when we realize God was walking beside us all along.
